section.title: New Features
section.p: Eucalyptus 4.0.0 introduces the following new features.

row.entry: We made changes to the way the Eucalyptus components are installed and registered. For more informaiton, see .
We added support for the new Edge networking mode. For more information, see or (for HA).
We added an object storage system that provides a S3 API interface. This interface is designed to scale out horizontally.
We added support for three default admininstrator personas. For more information, see .
We enhanced the elastic load balancing features. For more information, see .
We are offering CloudFormation templates in technical preview. For more information about cloud formation, go to Working with AWS CloudFormation Templates.
